alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 14 at 3:30AM MST until February 16 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM MST /MIDNIGHT CST/ THIS EVENING TO 5 AM MST /6 AM CST/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 8 inches Northeast to northwest winds gusting 35 to 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of east central Colorado and northwest and west central Kansas. * WHEN...From 11 PM MST /midnight CST/ this evening to 5 AM MST /6 AM CST/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility below one mile at times. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
